Parts.A: <You would approach Bugsy, towing a Rhino calf behind you, a few vials of blood in one hand, and the severead head of a Rhino in the other, dropping everything infront of him without many words>
((You do not have the 3 Demon Blood, the Grey Rhino Head and the Rhino Calf Lasho asked you to get. Perhaps you should only approach Bugsy once you collected all 3 items))

Who are you, Exile! What is the meaning of this? What... <he seems to spot the Rhino calf, his eyes going from the little animal to the severed head. He looks schocked>

  What did you do! Did you harm those poor creatures parents? Why would you do that! What have these poor, poor creatures done to you to deserve that!

And you just did that without asking any questions? These animals need to be respected! Not...mistreated like this. Oh that poor, poor thing.

  Now go. I will care for the mess you made! Go! GO!
I do not wish to speak with you. You are...not welcome here for the time being!
Parts.N: Turned in the items, but did not speak to Lasho yet. Blocks merchant until player speaks to Lasho.
